title: get might be stuck due to ssh sockets being outdated (even though needing not to fetch via ssh)
body:
switched from wifi to the ethernet and failed to `datalad get` until removed `/home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/` . git annex get worked ok
```shell
$> datalad -l debug get sub003/anatomy
[DEBUG  ] Determined class of decorated function: <class 'datalad.distribution.get.Get'> 
[DEBUG  ] Determined class of decorated function: <class 'datalad.interface.annotate_paths.AnnotatePaths'> 
[DEBUG  ] Determined class of decorated function: <class 'datalad.distribution.subdatasets.Subdatasets'> 
[DEBUG  ] Resolved dataset for subdataset reporting/modification: <Dataset path=/home/yoh/datalad_aside2/labs/haxby/raiders> 
[DEBUG  ] Determine what files match the query to work with 
[DEBUG  ] Running: ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'annex', 'find', '--debug', '-c', 'remote.atlantis.dartmouth.edu.annex-ssh-options=-o ControlMaster=auto -S /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/71d4e1e2', '-c', 'remote.smaug.annex-ssh-options=-o ControlMaster=auto -S /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/smaug -o ControlMaster=auto -S /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/a8723096', '--json', '--json', '--not', '--in', 'here', 'sub003/anatomy'] 
[INFO   ] Actually getting 7 files 
Total:   0%|                                                                                                          | 0.00/29.5M [00:00<?, ?B/s][DEBUG  ] Running: ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'annex', 'get', '--debug', '-c', 'remote.atlantis.dartmouth.edu.annex-ssh-options=-o ControlMaster=auto -S /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/71d4e1e2', '-c', 'remote.smaug.annex-ssh-options=-o ControlMaster=auto -S /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/smaug -o ControlMaster=auto -S /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/a8723096', '--json', '--json-progress', u'sub003/anatomy/highres008.PAR', u'sub003/anatomy/highres008.REC', u'sub003/anatomy/highres008.nii.gz', u'sub003/anatomy/scout001.PAR', u'sub003/anatomy/scout001.REC', u'sub003/anatomy/scout005.PAR', u'sub003/anatomy/scout005.REC'] 
ERROR:                                                                                                                                            
Interrupted by user while doing magic:  [cmd.py:_get_output_online:242]
[DEBUG  ] Using existing Git repository at /home/yoh/datalad_aside2/labs/haxby/raiders 
(dev) 2 30416 ->1.....................................:Mon 24 Jul 2017 12:52:42 PM EDT:.
hopa:~/datalad_aside2/labs/haxby/raiders
$> rm -rf /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/*
zsh: sure you want to delete all 3 files in /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets [yn]? y
(dev) 2 30417.....................................:Mon 24 Jul 2017 12:52:46 PM EDT:.
hopa:~/datalad_aside2/labs/haxby/raiders
$> datalad -l debug get sub003/anatomy      
[DEBUG  ] Determined class of decorated function: <class 'datalad.distribution.get.Get'> 
[DEBUG  ] Determined class of decorated function: <class 'datalad.interface.annotate_paths.AnnotatePaths'> 
[DEBUG  ] Determined class of decorated function: <class 'datalad.distribution.subdatasets.Subdatasets'>

[INFO   ] Actually getting 7 files 
Total:   0%|                                                                                                          | 0.00/29.5M [00:00<?, ?B/s][DEBUG  ] Running: ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'annex', 'get', '--debug', '-c', 'remote.atlantis.dartmouth.edu.annex-ssh-options=-o ControlMaster=auto -S /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/71d4e1e2', '-c', 'remote.smaug.annex-ssh-options=-o ControlMaster=auto -S /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/smaug -o ControlMaster=auto -S /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/a8723096', '--json', '--json-progress', u'sub003/anatomy/highres008.PAR', u'sub003/anatomy/highres008.REC', u'sub003/anatomy/highres008.nii.gz', u'sub003/anatomy/scout001.PAR', u'sub003/anatomy/scout001.REC', u'sub003/anatomy/scout005.PAR', u'sub003/anatomy/scout005.REC']

[DEBUG  ] received JSON result from annex: {u'note': u'checksum...', u'file': u'sub003/anatomy/highres008.REC', u'command': u'get', u'key': u'MD5E-s20971520--00ac709849b00d884151f2e39d2b51cd.REC', u'success': True} 
get(ok): /home/yoh/datalad_aside2/labs/haxby/raiders/sub003/anatomy/highres008.REC (file)
```

not sure yet how we should address that :-/
